game.name: Elsa Sweet Wedding
game.description:
Wow! The gorgeous girl and your favorite princess Elsa have found her love and she has decided to tie a knot with him today. It means Elsa and Jack will hold a wedding party tonight. Her bffs Anna and Moana will join them as the bridesmaids. You would have to decorate their room and also guide both of them to choose the perfect wedding outfits. Would you like to accept this unique fun challenge? Join Elsa Sweet Wedding game and be prepared to play the role of a wedding designer!
There are three stages to complete for you in this brand new dressing game for girls. In the first mode, you have to prepare an elegant outfit for the bride who cannot compromise on her look. Give her a long and beautiful gown with some cool flair, choose a nice and suitable hairstyle and combine her look with a crown on her head and suitable jewelry! Hurry up, ladies! Her bridesmaids are also waiting for their turn. Dress them both with the available clothing and accessory options in the second stage!
In the third stage, you have to decorate the wedding room by challenging your decoration abilities. Make sure to fill the floor with some lovely flowers, and change the carpet and its border design as per your desire. You can also change the items sitting at the both sides of the carpet. Once you are done, click the right click button and you will be ready to witness the biggest wedding of your life. Your nice efforts will help Elsa to feel proud on you. Good luck to play more wedding games on atmegame.com, no download required!
